alert.note: Alert for Dewey (South Dakota) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Aberdeen (Northern and Northeastern South Dakota)
info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued June 23 at 7:29PM MDT until June 23 at 8:15PM MDT by NWS Aberdeen
info.description: The National Weather Service in Aberdeen has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... South central Dewey County in north central South Dakota... * Until 815 PM MDT. * At 729 PM MDT, a severe thunderstorm was located over Parade, or 9 miles east of Eagle Butte, moving southeast at 10 mph. HAZARD...Half dollar size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Damage to vehicles is expected. * This severe thunderstorm will remain over mainly rural areas of south central Dewey County, including the following locations... Cheyenne River Reservation. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.25 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...<50 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
